context.prev_sent: Most of those funds were not affected by the Stafford Loan rate change.
context.next_sent: "There are a lot of options with a Stafford Loan when you are having trouble making payments," Cardwell said.

text: And while the student loan bubble has been compared to the housing loan bubble, which played a significant role in the 2008 financial crisis, Cardwell said she doesn't believe the two markets aren't exactly comparable as federal student loans are unlikely to burst.
